Paul H. Beaumont paul.beaumont@polytechnique.edu

PhD candidate at Paris Dauphine
Researcher at Insee and Crest

Research interests: corporate finance, labor and finance, M&A
Download my resume

Working papers

1. Time Is Money: Cash-Flow Risk and Product Market Behavior, in revision.
Long payment delays in the domestic market do represent a financial barrier to international trade. Estimations exploiting a 2009 French reform show that an exogenous decrease in payment delays of 10 days lowers the probability to exit an export market by 7.2% and raises the probability to enter a new one by 0.4%.

2. Build or Buy? Human Capital and Corporate Diversification, with Camille Hébert and Victor Lyonnet
First version coming soon.

3. The Secret Costs of Trade Secrets, with Gilles Chemla
In preparation.

View also my SSRN profile.

Prime à l’embauche dans les petites et moyennes entreprises : une première évaluation à partir des déclarations d’embauche, with Antoine Luciani and Ihssane Slimani Houti, Insee Analyses, 2016 (pdf).
